name: Eviction Notice
description:
## No Rights for the Tenants

When corporate giants set their site on an old piece of property, they don’t care how long the squatters have been there. So, instead, they hire deniable assets to come in and make sure that the trash gets taken to the curb. The only kink in the plan is that the corporate overlords don’t want you to cause any damage, kill anyone, or bring the eye of law enforcement on their building reclamation. And when you work the shadows, everyone seems to want a favor.
